=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 4 hours 12 mins -
8 hours 24 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours 48 mins -
5 hours 36 mins || 34 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 52 mins -
3 hours 44 mins || 23 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
